description: We’re kicking off Bartholomew Fayre with a proper Friday night feast! Our friends at Cloth Restaurant will be serving up something special for the community. The menu will feature a mouth-watering hog roast, generously donated by Smithfield Market, a true nod to the area’s history, and yummy veggie and vegan options alongside a pay bar.

events.name: Drop in: Bartholomew Fayre: Hog Roast and Bar
events.notes: Pay bar in operation between 4-7.45pm. Hog Roast available until stock runs out!

factsheet.heading: Bartholomew Fayre: Hog Roast and Bar
paragraphs: We’re kicking off Bartholomew Fayre with a proper Friday night feast! Our friends at Cloth Restaurant will be serving up something special for the community. The menu will feature a mouth-watering hog roast, generously donated by Smithfield Market, a true nod to the area’s history, and yummy veggie and vegan options alongside a pay bar.
Part of Bartholomew Fayre: Power to the People neighbourhood festival.

location.address: Smithfield Rotunda Garden, West Smithfield, EC1A 9PT

name: Bartholomew Fayre:  Hog Roast and Bar
